title: Magnetoresistance (MR) properties of magnetic materials
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18617-18645
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01989J, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Okvarahireka Vitayaya, Phahul Zhemas Zul Nehan, Dicky Rezky Munazat, Maykel T. E. Manawan, Budhy Kurniawan
This review article provides a very general extensive review of magnetoresistance (MR), including AMR, CMR, TMR, GMR, and compares the latest findings and developments in this field.
